divs: Sighting DetailsI was driving west on I-580 in Livermore,Ca. I seen something shine in the sky and I looked and thought what the "F" is that. It was a silver, metallic,oval disc like object. I was driving so I had to keep looking at the road, and when I looked away and looked back I could'nt see it anymore. I was thinking what was that and where did it go? It was West North West at about 45 degrees in the sky, and 40 miles away.
trends: There have been 24 other sightings in Oakland
There were no other sightings in Oakland on or around July 30th 2008
